name: Cyclone Necklace
description:
This necklace is truly a knockout.

Hand cut from sheets of sterling silver and copper, then patinated and selectively polished, the Cyclone necklace incorporates beautiful textures and dimensions.

Hand riveted. Sterling silver chain. Signature Sprout handmade hook and eye clasp.

Dimensions:
Chain: 17" in length
Pendant:
About 4" in "height"
About 1.5" in width at widest point.
_______________________________

Handmade in Long Island City by Sprout Jewelry. Sprout pieces comes boxed or wrapped in tissue paper (depending on dimensions.)

Pieces generally ship within 7 business days from the day that your payment clears. If an item is needed in a hurry, I can usually accommodate you, but please check with me prior to ordering.

name: One Thousand Wishes Necklace
description:
Throw a penny in a fountain, make a wish and watch the ripples spread across the water. This necklace captures the effect of those ripples, starting small and growing larger. Each loop was made individually from sterling silver and gold filled wire. Polished to a brilliant shine. Pendant is suspended from your choice of a 16" or 24" silver ball chain.

Pendant is just over 1.5" in length.

______________________________

Handmade in Long Island City by Sprout Jewelry. Sprout pieces comes boxed or wrapped in tissue paper (depending on dimensions.)

Pieces generally ship within 7 business days from the day that your payment clears. If an item is needed in a hurry, I can usually accommodate you, but please check with me prior to ordering.

name: Slate Necklace
description:
Slip on this striking, lightweight necklace and you'll be turning heads wherever you go!

Each rectangle of silver was cut and shaped by hand. The silver "bar" chain was made by hand as well. The chain is fashioned in such a way that allows the necklace to drape like a collar around the neckline.

The hook and eye clasp was hand forged and is adjustable; the necklace can be worn at either 16.5 or 18.5 inches.

The entire piece was patinated, then selectively sanded to create the contrasting dark and light patches that really allow the piece to "pop."

The dimensions of each individual rectangle is 3/4" x 1/2"
_______________________________

Handmade in Long Island City by Sprout Jewelry. Sprout pieces comes boxed or wrapped in tissue paper (depending on dimensions.)

Pieces generally ship within 7 business days from the day that your payment clears. If an item is needed in a hurry, I can usually accommodate you, but please check with me prior to ordering.

name: Crescent Hoops
description:
The earrings that will make you wonder "Where have you been all my life?"

These delicate silver hoops are the perfect accessory to absolutely any outfit, no matter if you're headed to work, school, or a night on the town. Super lightweight, but sturdy (will hold their shape no matter how many times you take them on and off.) Sterling silver, hand formed, hammered slightly for maximum "glimmer" and sparkle!

Dimensions:
- 1 1/4" in diameter
______________________________

Handmade in Long Island City by Sprout Jewelry.

name: Rita Ring
description:
A single nest of silver and copper saucers, formed by hand and soldered to a square band. Simple, clean, organic shapes. Pleasing to the eye, the copper adds a "pop" that always assures admirers.

Silver has been darkened with patina and selectively brushed. Inner saucer is copper. 

Size:
Outer "saucer" is just over 1/2" in diameter

______________________________

Handmade in Long Island City by Sprout Jewelry. Sprout pieces comes boxed or wrapped in tissue paper (depending on dimensions.)

Pieces generally ship within 7 business days from the day that your payment clears. If an item is needed in a hurry, I can usually accommodate you, but please check with me prior to ordering.
